Runtime On The Server

NEWS: 2007/05/01 -- The Junction web application server is undergoing a major rewrite/port onto the open-source Helma Object Publisher (HOP) server.  The HOP server is a JavaScript web application server implemented using the Rhino JavaScript interpreter.

Details are still forthcoming, but until then please see the HOP site and online documentation at http://helma.org
